name: Bad Taste (KeeVee Games)
description:
I am Derek and Dereks don't run!

Make skewers by catching falling bodies in this crazy retro arcade!

Welcome to hell's kitchen. In this casual retro arcade game you take the role of brutal Derek, which needs to feed the most nasty and gluttonous creature in the underworld! Unfortunately, it's favorite meal is corpses of sinners, which you are ordered to deliver as a kebab.

  • Unlock 25 cool achievements!
  • Rotate your device. Use g-sensor or taps to control the game!
  • Stick corpses onto the spike, growing from your helmet!
  • Don't let the corpses fall down, or they'll be a reason of your poisoning!
  • Drink beer and restore your health!
  • Reach the top of highscore leaderboards!
  • Let your friends on Facebook and Twitter know, how cool you are!
  • Enjoy the old-school pixelart!
  • Jam to 8-bit music!
  • Aaaah!
